name: Cantering Hearts
description:
Your choices probably matter in this comedic equine visual novel about the joy of horse riding, the thrill of competition, and of course dating some cute dudes. 

Dev Twitter: https://twitter.com/MemeCatGames

Features:

  • 3 love interests to pick from
  • 4 different endings based on choices during competition scenes.
    • Ending have various scenes/text depending on who you choose to romance!
  • Will you stick to the rules or the cheat the system? You decide.

Characters bios:

Credits (see game for more):

  • Sprite artist: Chilton421
  • Background artist: TwiffCane99
  • Main menu song: TimBeek
  • Editor: AmateurSketch
  • This game was made with the CloudNovel visual novel maker.
